thread.title: Police: Man robbed, stabbed after bringing women to hotel room
thread.title_full: Police: Man robbed, stabbed after bringing women to hotel room - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Police: Man robbed, stabbed after bringing women to hotel room
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - New Orleans police are looking for two women who robbed and stabbed a man after he brought them back to his hotel on the edge of the French Quarter.
The 42-year-old victim invited the women back to his room in the 200 block of Poydras Street around 3:30 a.m. on Thursday. The man realized he was missing some money and approached one of the women, according to an initial police report.
Police say the woman pulled out a pocket knife and stabbed the victim. He was taken to a hospital.
The women left the scene in a dark colored BMW with a Texas license plate GBV8978.
Citizens with information about this crime are asked to call Crimestoppers at 822-1111 or toll-free 1-877-903-STOP(7867) or Text your crime tip to C-R-I-M-E-S (274637), Text TELLCS then your crime information. You could receive a cash reward of up to $2,500 for information leading to the arrest and indictment of the person(s) responsible. You do not have to give your name nor testify to receive the reward. Citizens can also submit an anonymous tip online to Crimestoppers at www.crimestoppersgno.org .
